required.description: The primary recipient's email address.
The subject line of the email. Can be generated by the agent based on context.
The main content of the email. Can be generated by the agent based on context.

optional.description: The sender's email address. Defaults to the authenticated user.
Carbon copy recipients' email addresses.
Blind carbon copy recipients' email addresses.
A list of file paths to be attached to the email.
The ID of an existing thread to make this email a reply.

required.description: The primary recipient's email address.
The subject line of the email. Can be generated by the agent based on context.
The main content of the email. Can be generated by the agent based on context.

optional.description: The sender's email address. Defaults to the authenticated user.
Carbon copy recipients' email addresses.
Blind carbon copy recipients' email addresses.
A list of file paths to be attached to the email.
The ID of an existing thread to make this email a reply.
The maximum number of messages to return.
A token to retrieve a specific page of results.
A list of label IDs to filter by.
Whether to include messages from Spam and Trash. Defaults to false.

required.description: The ID of the message to label.

optional.description: A list of label IDs to add to the message.
A list of label IDs to remove from the message.

required.description: The search query.

optional.description: The maximum number of messages to return.
A token to retrieve a specific page of results.
A list of label IDs to filter by.
Whether to include messages from Spam and Trash. Defaults to false.

required.description: The ID of the email thread to summarize.
The ID of the file or folder to copy.
The ID of the destination folder.

optional.description: The new name for the copied file or folder. Defaults to the original name.
The specific version ID of the file to copy.

required.description: The name of the new folder.
The ID of the parent folder. Use '0' for the root folder.

optional.description: A unique email address for uploading to the folder.
Specifies whether the folder should be synced to a user's device.

required.description: The ID of the file or folder to delete.

optional.description: Whether to delete a folder that is not empty. Defaults to false.
The etag of the file or folder to ensure you are deleting the correct version.

required.description: The ID of the file to download.

optional.description: The specific version ID of the file to download.
An access token to pre-authenticate the download.
The byte range of the file to download.

required.description: The ID of the file or folder to move.
The ID of the destination folder. Use '0' for the root folder.
The search query.

optional.description: The scope of the search. Can be 'user_content' or 'enterprise_content'.
A comma-separated list of file extensions to filter by.
The date range to filter by creation date.
The date range to filter by update date.
The size range in bytes to filter by.
A comma-separated list of user IDs to filter by owner.
A comma-separated list of folder IDs to search within.
A comma-separated list of content types to search within.
The type of item to search for. Can be 'file', 'folder', or 'web_link'.
Whether to search in the trash. Can be 'trashed_only' or 'non_trashed_only'.
A JSON object representing a metadata query.
The field to sort by. Can be 'modified_at'.
The sort direction. Can be 'ASC' or 'DESC'.

required.description: The ID of the file or folder to share.

optional.description: The access level of the shared link. Can be 'open', 'company', or 'collaborators'.
A password to protect the shared link.
The date and time when the link will be disabled.
A custom name for the shared link URL.
Whether the item can be downloaded. Defaults to false.
Whether the item can be previewed. Defaults to false.
Whether the item can be edited. Defaults to false.

required.description: The ID of the folder to upload the file to.
The local path to the file to upload.

optional.description: The name of the file in Box. Defaults to the original file name.
The timestamp of when the file was originally created.
The timestamp of when the file was last modified.

required.description: The type of design to create. Can be 'preset' or 'custom'.

optional.description: The name of the preset design type. Required if 'design_type' is 'preset'.
The width of the design in pixels. Required if 'design_type' is 'custom'.
The height of the design in pixels. Required if 'design_type' is 'custom'.
The title of the design.
The ID of an asset to create the design from.

required.description: The ID of the design to export.
The format to export the design in. Can be 'pdf', 'jpg', 'png', 'gif', 'pptx', or 'mp4'.

optional.description: A list of page numbers to export.
The quality of the export. Can be 'regular' or 'pro'.
The width of the exported design in pixels.
The height of the exported design in pixels.
Whether to use lossless compression for PNGs. Defaults to true.
Whether to merge all pages into a single image for PNGs. Defaults to false.
The search query.
The ownership of the designs to search for. Can be 'any', 'owned', or 'shared'.
The field to sort by. Defaults to 'relevance'.
A token to retrieve the next page of results.

required.description: The ID of the design to share.
The type of share link to generate. Can be 'view' or 'edit'.
The ID of the space to create the page in.
The title of the page.
The content of the page in Atlassian Document Format (ADF).

optional.description: The ID of the parent page to create a nested page.

required.description: The ID of the page to add the attachment to.
The local path to the file to attach.

optional.description: A comment to add to the attachment.
Whether the attachment upload is a minor edit. Defaults to false.

required.description: The ID of the page to add the comment to.
The content of the comment in Confluence storage format.
The ID of the page to get content from.

optional.description: The format of the body to return. Defaults to 'storage'.

required.description: The Confluence Query Language (CQL) query to use for the search.

optional.description: The context for the CQL query.
Whether to include content from archived spaces. Defaults to false.
The maximum number of results to return.
The starting point of the result set for pagination.
A token to retrieve the next page of results.
A comma-separated list of properties to expand in the results.

The ID of the page to update.
The new title of the page.

The new version number of the page.

optional.description: The new status of the page. Can be 'current' or 'draft'.

required.description: The path to the folder to create.

optional.description: Whether to automatically rename the folder if a conflict occurs. Defaults to false.

required.description: The path to the file or folder to delete.
The path of the file to download.
The path of the file or folder to move.
The destination path for the file or folder.

optional.description: Whether to allow moving a shared folder. Defaults to false.
Whether to automatically rename the file or folder if a conflict occurs. Defaults to false.
Whether to allow transferring ownership of a shared folder. Defaults to false.

required.description: The search query.

optional.description: The path to search within.
The maximum number of results to return.
The field to sort by. Can be 'relevance' or 'last_modified_time'.
A list of file extensions to filter by.
A list of file categories to filter by.
Whether to search image content. Defaults to false.

required.description: The path to the file or folder to share.

optional.description: The visibility of the shared link. Can be 'public', 'team_only', or 'password'.
A password to protect the shared link.
The expiration date and time for the link.
A list of members to add to the file or folder.
Whether to suppress email notifications to members. Defaults to false.
A custom message to include in the invitation email.
The access level to grant to members. Can be 'viewer' or 'editor'.

required.description: The full path in the user's Dropbox to save the file to.
The local path to the file to upload.

optional.description: The upload mode. Can be 'add', 'overwrite', or 'update'.
Whether to automatically rename the file if a conflict occurs. Defaults to false.
Whether to suppress desktop notifications for this upload. Defaults to false.
Whether to fail the upload if a conflict occurs. Defaults to false.

The name of the repository.

optional.description: The field to sort the results by. Can be 'comments', 'created', or 'updated'. Defaults to 'best match'.
The direction of the sort. Can be 'asc' or 'desc'. Defaults to 'desc'.

required.description: The ID of the calendar containing the event.
The ID of the event to cancel.

optional.description: Who to send notifications to. Can be 'all', 'externalOnly', or 'none'.

The end of the interval for the query.

optional.description: The time zone to be used in the response.

The maximum number of calendars for which free/busy information is to be provided.

optional.description: The start of the time range to query for events.
